item.description:
Marge Fish will be leading a Green Mountain Club hike to Stratton Mtn VT. from North Brookwood via a snowmobile trail to the Long Trail to the summit of Stratton, using the summit trail to ski area summit and return via the Wanderer ski trail ?

approximately 5 miles, moderate

meet at the Bondville post office on rt 30 at 9am to car pool as there is limited parking at the trailhead

trip leader Marge Fish, 802-824-3662,
marge.fish@gmail.com
item.name: Stratton Mtn from North Brookwood
